title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush asked what Obama knew and when he knew it on February 14, 2017. Obama directed the creation of the Russia collusion narrative in Oval Office meeting on January 5, 2017. Obama leaks audio of criticism of Trump on coronavirus to distract from Flynn. Dr. Sowell on Obama's talent to make nonsense sound eloquent to people who don't know any better. Michelle Obama Netflix film flops. Birx says she can't trust the CDC, suggests they may be inflating death toll by 25%. Willie Brown says California has to open up. Sports media making case that sports can't open. Georgia sees lowest day of COVID-19 hospitalizations since reopening 15 days ago. When Rush first feared lockdown advocates had no intention of reopening any time soon.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Where were the Republicans when all of these Obama officials were testifying under oath that they'd seen no evidence of Trump-Russia collusion? Roger Stone and K.T. McFarland say Mueller team did same thing to them that they did to Flynn. Andy McCarthy on Obama January 5, 2017 Oval Office meeting. There will be no investigation, prosecution of Obama. F. Chuck Todd purposely lies about what Bill Barr said on the Flynn case. Victor Davis Hanson on Obama and the collusion hoax. Illinois business owner frustrated by lockdown. Mnuchin predicts permanent economic damage if we don't reopen soon.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Power-hungry governors and mayors using lockdowns to discriminate against churches; Barr is all over it. Mollie Hemingway tweet on fake news. Who will hold the media accountable for its lies to get rid of Trump? Mnuchin warns of permanent economic damage if we stay closed. NYT scare story on ChiCom hacking. Barr and Durham. Where were all the Republicans who could have exposed the hoax? Left turns on Elon Musk. Michelle Obama's Netflix flop.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
